content: It's important to note that not every technique will work for everyone and those who have severe anxiety disorders may require additional support from a mental health professional. However, many of these techniques have been shown to be effective in reducing general anxiety and stress levels, and may be helpful for individuals experiencing exam anxiety. It's also important to practice these techniques in advance, and not rely solely on them during the exam. Individuals with severe anxiety disorders may need to work with a mental health professional to develop a more comprehensive treatment plan that addresses their specific needs.
